alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward County through 415 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tamarac. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Margate, Lauderhill, Weston, North Lauderdale, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Pine Island Ridge and Markham Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
